summary: Internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, discussing a request for assistance from Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The emails show FBI agents coordinating to provide help with evidence and discovery work.

events.title: FBI Request for Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends out a request for assistance related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, seeking help with evidence and discovery work.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 2020.
The assistance needed was primarily for in-office work with evidence and discovery, expected to last several months.
The request highlights the investigation was still ongoing and considered a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' within the FBI.
An FBI agent from the New York Field Office was on temporary duty (TDY) in Albuquerque but expressed enthusiasm to help with the case remotely if possible.
